Name.label: Primary bone dysplasia with increased bone density

TextSection.Contents: Metaphyseal dysplasia, Braun-Tinschert type is characterised by metapyhseal undermodeling with broadening of the long bones and femora with an 'Erlenmeyer flask'' appearance, expansion and bowing of the radii with severe varus deformity and flat exostoses of the long bones at the metadiaphyseal junctions.

Name.label: E (exact mapping (the terms and the concepts are equivalent))
